about_product: SNUG FIT: Adjustable laces provide a secure fit
FLEXIBLE UPPER: Soft textile upper is stretchy and comfortable
CUSHIONED MIDSOLE: Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning

MADE IN PART WITH RECYCLED CONTENT: This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make
product_description: Slip into easy comfort in these men's adidas sneakers. They have a sock-like upper that fits super snug and makes them a snap to get on and off. A Cloudfoam midsole provides all-day cushioning.

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #432 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)    #5 in Men's Road Running Shoes

customers_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their lightweight design and slip-on convenience. The style is similar to the 5.0 model, and customers consider them good value for money. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding them true to size while others say they run narrow. Additionally, several customers report issues with the laces breaking after minimal use.

top_reviews.review_comment: Love these shoes!! Wore them today for the first time on a walk at the lake and they did not disappoint. The foam sole material is excellent under my feet and they are nice and snug while wearing. Definitely buying more
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Cool looking shoe. Comfortable. Good cushion in sole. Slip on ease. Bought multiple times. I buy one size larger for optimum fit and comfort
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Have been buying these shoes for years now and they are my go to. Comfy, light, and affordable
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Super comfortable, easy to slip on, great for walking and casual wear. I’m on my second pair! Which leads me to my missing star - these shoes don’t last very far. When you first get them they’re pretty tight. But after a day or two, they stretch out all right. The soles are super cushy, like marshmallows. But after a few months they will be forming holes. Consider the price, they’re super cheap. They’re the Adidas version of Hey Dudes, their longevity is not very deep.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great quality. They fit true to size. Lots of support and comfort.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Another win for ADIDAS! Great shoes, super comfortable and light weight. Sizes fit perfectly.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: True to size! Ordered an 11 and they fit perfectly. For being a slip on type of sneaker, they have great heal lock and ankle hold if that makes sense! Im usually in thorogoods work boots all day everyday, if not, I have a pair of slip on vans shoes. Time for something more comfortable for the times im not in boots!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great looking shoe and made very well. Only thing is I believe the sizing is a little bit misleading. I ordered a twelve wide and the box says twelve wide however the shoe is very tight and will not fit. Therefore ordering should probably be a little larger than what you are used to. Now that is just my opinion.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Once and awhile some store goes on Amazon to clear old stock.. if you see them grab them..

I received my order promptly. I am normally a size nine and a half or ten so I ordered ten. They fit perfect. The day I received them I used them for my daily walk of seven kilometers (5 miles). Very comfortable walk and no blisters or sore feet. I have used them for my walks for about a week now and I have had no problems and find the shoes are very good for this purpose. I like the slip on factor. It is a bit tight to slip in but I got used to it. Well built slip in for sure. Good arch support as well.
El dieño es increíble, son muy cómodos y no resbalan en sueño mojado. Gran producto.

top_reviews_global.review_title: Easy to slip on and easy on the knees
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Love the slip on ease of these shoes, great cushiony soles and the best part is your feet can breathe.
